Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: In 1987, President Haim Herzog visiting Switzerland, the mayor of Bern, gave him a present of two lttle Syrian bears, which is the symbol of the Town.
